summary: Procedural terrain + buildings and seeded generation were added and integrated into the Three.js scene, but the diff does not convincingly remove the Google Maps dependency/config usage end-to-end (API key accessors and Google Maps modules still exist/are modified), so REQ-7 is not fully satisfied based on the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the Google Maps dependency and configuration gating so the simulator runs without requiring VITE_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY.
missing_requirements.reason: Although the main sim view no longer shows a Google Maps gating UI, the diff still contains Google Maps integration modules and API-key access utilities (and they are modified, not removed). From the diff summary alone, it is not verifiable that the app no longer reads/requires VITE_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY, nor that Google Maps endpoint requests cannot occur during gameplay (even if the new scene uses procedural terrain).
evidence: frontend/src/config.ts (mentioned in frontend-file-summaries.txt as exporting getGoogleMapsApiKey)
frontend/src/sim/FlightSimView.tsx (shows removal of gating UI but not removal of dependency)

hallucinated_features.description: Changed/expanded flight physics model (lift/drag/ground collision tweaks) beyond procedural-world replacement scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on replacing Google Maps ground with procedural terrain/buildings and deterministic seeding/reset integration; it does not request flight-model tuning changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed StartOverlay marketing copy and footer link content.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; UI copy changes are unrelated to the procedural world/map removal requirements.
